chat.msg: Welcome!
Starting by the map go straight across the river to the next island with the tiger.
Alright, I see the river and a twig to the left of the starting point. I am now at the small island with the tiger. What's next?
Do a slight curve around the rock and across the next river
I am curving around the rock and see the river. Should I go straight across the river or to the left island with the butterfly?
Straight across and around the bird and in front of the elephant
I am straight across the river and seeing the big island with a parrot sitting on a tree. I am curving around the parrot and seeing the elephant in front of me. What's the direction to go next?
Then across the rocks and in front of the frog. Make a loop going towards the back of that island and across the alligator.
I have crossed the rocks and seeing the small island with the frog on the left. Should I keep going straight or make a left turn towards the back of the island?
Left turn then back around across alligator.

I am now at the left of the frog and making a left turn towards the back of the island. Now I see the alligator. Should I cross the alligator and head towards the elephant again or take a different route?
Cross the alligator
I have crossed the alligator and now I am at the same big island with the elephant. What's the direction to take from here?
Then cross the black rock in front of the elephant
I have crossed the black rock and seeing a giraffe to the left. What's the direction to take next?
Head across the rocks toward giraffe staying on outer edge of island.
I am heading across the rocks towards the giraffe while staying on the outer edge of the island. What's next?
Next cross towards snake and pass it to get to treasure chest.

I have crossed the rocks and seeing the snake to my front right. I am heading directly towards the snake and passing it on my right side. I can now see the treasure. Hooray! We made it to the treasure.  *finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
Start by the deer laying near the water
I'm sorry, I'm not sure which deer you're referring to. The starting point on my map is a white dog. Can you please tell me where the white dog is in relation to the deer you're talking about?
Sorry start at the dog by the bench
go in front of the bench and loop around toward the flower stand

Ok, I'm looking at the map and I can see the white dog next to the bench you mentioned. I'm walking in front of the bench and I see a wooden branch going south and another going northwest. Which way should I go to reach the flower stand?
Cross the branch across the river near the white dog by the bench

I'm crossing the branch across the river near the bench where the white dog is. I can see the white dog sitting next to the red and white picnic carpet. Which way should I go from here to reach the florist stand?
Loop around and across the picnic blanket
Alright, I'm looping around the picnic blanket and now I see a branch going northwest towards the florist stand. Should I take that branch to reach the florist stand?
Take the branch path toward the florist stand and loop around the bush

I'm on the branch path going towards the florist stand. I see a bush on my right and I'm looping around it. Now I can see the florist stand ahead of me and there's a bridge that begins right after it. Should I cross the bridge?
Cross the bridge with bikes on it
I'm crossing the bridge with two people riding a bicycle together. Now I see two old people sitting on a bench and reading a newspaper. Should I continue straight or turn somewhere?
Then take a left in front of the people reading on the bench
Alright, I'm taking a left in front of the people reading on the bench and I can see a brown deer to my south-east. Have we reached our final destination?

chat.msg: Welcome!
Start at the teepee and cross in front of the dog
I see the tent on the north of the map and a dog sitting south of the tent. I will head south from the tent, passing in front of the dog. What direction should I go now?
take a left and loop around the fire pit
I've turned left and now I see a fire pit. Should I loop around it clockwise or counterclockwise?
clockwise
Got it, I'm currently looping around the fire pit clockwise. What direction should I take now?
Walk in front of the red and white mushrooms
I have completed the loop around the fire pit and now I see a red mushroom. Do I need to pass in front of red mushroom only or is there another mushroom nearby?
Pass in front of it then make a loop in front of blue car
Understood. I have passed in front of the red mushroom and now I'm heading towards the blue car. Which direction should I take for the loop around the car? Clockwise or counter-clockwise?
Make a right or clockwise
I have made a right and gone around the blue car clockwise. What direction should I take from here?
Go in front of it clockwise not around
Apologies for misunderstanding earlier. I've gone in front of the blue car clockwise, passing it on the right side. What direction should I go now?
Go around the bush in the front and continue straight on the path
Great, I've made a turn around the bush in front of me and now I'm directly on the path. What is the next instruction?
Pass in front of the telescope cutting between the bush and telescope
Understood, I passed in front of the telescope and cut between the telescope and the bush. What direction should I go now?
Go right and cross across the rocks ending at the cabin
Got it, I've turned right and now I see a rocks structure ahead of me. Should I go through the rocks or take a route around it?
Through the rocks
OK. I have passed through the rocks and I see a wooden house or cabin at the end of the path. Shall I go all the way to the cabin?
Yes
Great, I have reached the wooden house. *finished*. Thank you for the instructions!
